entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Waskaganish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:13 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Waskaganish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:16 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waskaganish Airport 9:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: -12.4°C
Pressure: 99.7 kPa
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -14.8°C
Wind: ESE 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning early this evening. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming west 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 29 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 29 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 37 in the evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
